question: 盗聴
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: I <kanji>steal</kanji> by <kanji>listen</kanji>ing to what people say. I do this by <vocabulary>wiretapping</vocabulary> their phone and <vocabulary>bugging</vocabulary> their homes.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
